title.narrative: SUPPLY OF QUALITY AND INCLUSIVE EARLY LEARNING AND EDUCATION

description.narrative: Output 2.2: By 2023, Government and partners have increased capacity to provide quality and inclusive early learning and education for children and adolescents

mailing-address.narrative: Lhaki Lham 1-11 P.O. Box 239 Thimphu Bhutan

sector.narrative: Provision of (formal and non-formal) multiple-levels or alternative pathways of education (including in temporary learning spaces)
System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
System strengthening - risk informed programming, including climate, resilience, disaster, conflict, and emergency preparedness
System strengthening - teacher development, management, and support
Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education

title.narrative: Bhutan United Nations Development Assistance Framework 2014-2018

2019 Bhutan: Evaluation of Early Childhood Care and Development Programme Bhutan

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.2: By 2023, Government and partners have increased capacity to provide quality and inclusive early learning and education for children and adolescents

description.narrative: 9000 plus teachers oriented on BPST and 22 ECCD facilitators, District Education Officers programme managers from ECCD and SEN Division of the Ministry of Education trained on the implementation of the Bhutan Child Development Screen Tool (BCDST). UNICEF's regular programme and humanitarian actions for children further strengthened the government's capacity to provide quality and inclusive early learning and education for children and adolescents. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:28/08/2020

baseline.value: Multi-sectoral task force for ECD strategy formed
